properties.name: Mount Bingham
properties.legend: Erupting volcano. Height: 16077 ft.

properties.name: Hiavheeshi
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 68Â°F.

properties.name: Stoverebonf Spring of Life
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Watzakt â€” gold mining town
properties.legend: Watzakt is a mining town of 9051 people just nearby the gold mine.

properties.name: Bumunz â€” iron mining town
properties.legend: Bumunz is a mining town of 1541 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.name: Nadusharak â€” silver mining town
properties.legend: Nadusharak is a mining town of 1575 people just nearby the silver mine.

properties.name: Tradeden â€” gold mining town
properties.legend: Tradeden is a mining town of 1837 people just nearby the gold mine.

properties.name: The Huge Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious baked corn with cold kumis is served here.

properties.name: The Loud Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious grilled peas with misty rom is served here.

properties.name: The Golden Mule
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious deep-fried corn with misty whisky is served here.

properties.name: The Peaceful Swan
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious smoked swan with green beer is served here.

properties.name: Moosebonf Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Rothelese Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Bash Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Selssad Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Altayan Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Givzieqeean Waterfall
properties.legend: A gorgeous waterfall flows here.

properties.name: Ashmor Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Kutyurt Conflict. 
Date: December 9, 1616 Brury Era.

properties.name: Ulbligz Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Pyrish War. 
Date: November 8, 1463 Brury Era.

properties.name: Nabilbil Monster
properties.legend: Legends say a relic monster of 13 ft long inhabits Nabilbil Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.name: Wisterby Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 22 ft long.

properties.name: Beter Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 22 ft long.

properties.name: Khiz Dragon
properties.legend: Rumors speak of a giant Dragon who inhabits Khiz hills and doesn't mind human flesh.

properties.name: Bibinargat Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Dunirr (Dwarven) Shamanism.

properties.name: Clearse Palm Grove
properties.legend: A palm grove sacred to local Anor (Human) Forefathers.

properties.name: Sran Ar Panthers
properties.legend: A gang of forest brigands.

properties.name: Smootford Beavers
properties.legend: A gang of forest robbers.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Castle
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient castle. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Acacith Collection
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Kokozo Contest
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a contest of speed in Kokozo, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Ghiz Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Ghiz, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Rooks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of rooks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Illusory mirage
properties.legend: This illusory mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Knighbreak Fracture
properties.legend: The Knighbreak Fracture. Locals claim that it is a good spot to hid treasure.

properties.name: Qavheesh Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Swangview Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Hobringai Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Silean Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Ancient Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured ancient rift in this area is causing all known nearby beings to flee in terror.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Ayli Necropolis
properties.legend: A sprawling necropolis built within a labyrinthine network of catacombs. Its halls are lined with countless alcoves, each housing the remains of the departed, while the distant sound of rattling bones fills the air.
